comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Funeral of anarchist Arthur Caron, who was killed, on July 4, 1914,  in the explosion of a bomb he was holding. The bomb apparently was intended for John D. Rockefeller:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5456220470/]
Where the bomb blew up:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5669471191/in/photostream/]

comment._content: Congratulations! This is a wonderful shot! You are invited to post it to: artland
